mni2subject_coords¶

Description¶

Transforms coordinates from MNI space to subject space.

Usage example¶

mni2subject_coords -m m2m_ernie/ -s list.csv -o ernie_10_10.csv

This will transform a list of defined in MNI space saved in the list.csv file to subject space.

Further notes¶

  • Type mni2subject_coords -h for more information and options, including on the format of the .csv files.

  • There are many different behaviors of this script depending on specifications of the .csv file. Type mni2subject_coords -h for a full description

  • This script is used to determine the electrode positions in the m2m_{subID}/eeg_positions/EEG10-10_UI_Jurak_2007.csv

  • When transforming electrode positions, the results are always projected to the skin after the transformation.
